verbose_text: The present study indicated that miR-222 inhibitor obviously reduced the cell proliferation/migration/invasion/Bcl-2/cyclin D1 protein levels and promoted cell apoptosis as well as BBC3 / caspase-3 protein levels, probably via binding with BBC3 in HepG2 cells.
evidence: miR-222 inhibitor obviously reduced the cell proliferation/migration/invasion/Bcl-2/cyclin D1 protein levels and promoted cell apoptosis as well as BBC3/caspase-3 protein levels, probably via binding with BBC3
